title: Clutch
name: clutch-cli
description: Command line tool for Clutch: A Developer SDK for Prismic.1o0

scripts.test:nodir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../clutch.js init
scripts.test:mkdir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../clutch.js init my-project
scripts.test:isdir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; mkdir my-project ; node ../clutch.js init my-project
